section.title: Jboss Maven Integration facet
section.para:
Jboss Maven Integration facet is a Project Facet which add Maven capabilities to the target project. This facet adds a Maven nature, builder and classpath container. Also Maven Integration facet can detect EJB, WAR or EAR facet and add corresponding maven plugins for them. Also Maven Integration facet provides the library providers. More about Maven Integration library providers you can read here.
JBoss Maven Integration facet

section.title: JBoss Maven Integration preference page
section.para: To adjust Maven project import setting for Jboss Tools projects you need open Preferences dialog by clicking Window > Preferences and select JBoss Tools >Jboss Maven Integration. This page provides configuration for Seam, JSF and Portlet projects import.
On the Jboss Maven Integration preferences page the following preferences are available:

entry.para: Configure Seam when importing Maven projects
If on,the Maven Integration Tool starts to check Seam dependencies and switch on the Seam Configurator for existing Maven projects import.
If on, the Maven Integration Tool will try to define Seam Runtime basing on information from pom.xml and workspace configuration.
Configure Seam Artifacts(view folder, model source folder and package...)
If the option is checked, the Seam configurator will start to recognize Seam Artifacts during importing Seam Maven project.
Configure JSF facet when importing Maven projects
This option is switch on picking up JSF facet from a pom.xml
Configure JBoss Portlet Core when importing Maven projects
Configure JBoss JSF Portlet facet when importing Maven projects
Configure JBoss Seam Portlet facet when importing Maven projects
